content: **45 x 60 throw in lion brand #860 vanna s choice on q-19 15 75 mm hook** *this beautiful afghan is quick and easy crochet it in just 5 and 1/2 hours lionbrand com * skill level easy size one size about 45 x 60 in 114 5 x 152 5 cm gauge 3 v-sts + 4 row = 6 in 15 cm in pattern with 3 strands of yarn held together crochet hook - size q-19 **15 75 mm** 11 in 28 cm piece of cardboard for fringe optional throw is worked with 1 strand each of 3 different colors held together throughout yarn three colors of #860 vanna s choice solids 5 skeins each 15 total if one of the colors is #860 vanna s choice heathers & prints or #860 vanna s choice tweeds you need 6 skeins of that color if one of the colors is #861 vanna s glamour you need 5 skeins of that color available on lionbrand com in many different colorways *without fringe* 70078a 1 autumn print honey rust 90338 2 autumn print brick rust *with fringe* 80087ad 3 rose mist antique rose pink 80088ad 4 tangerine mist pearl mist terracotta 80089ad 5 kelly green dusty blue taupe 80112ad 6 linen sapphire kelly green 80683ad 7 rust linen brick 80706ad 8 terracotta linen beige l0463 9 rust brick topaz tv lapghan pattern # 70375ad 70376ad skill level easy size one size about 45 x 60 in 114 5 x 152 5 cm excluding fringe gauge 3 v-sts + 4 row = 6 in 15 cm in pattern with 3 strands of yarn held together crochet hook -
